typeDescription.name: werti.uima.types.annot.RelevantText
typeDescription.description: Optional annotation to specify which text to work on.

featureDescription.name: htmlContentType
featureDescription.description: The text type classification (headline, main, comments, etc.).

featureDescription.name: enclosing_tag
featureDescription.description: The html tag that encloses this text fragment.

featureDescription.name: relevant
featureDescription.description: Is this a relevant chunk of input or too small? The idea is that a piece of text can make it to being relevant, iff it is between to already relevant pieces of text, but itself too small to be included and all tags that were opened between the first piece of actually relevant text and this piece of irrelevant text are closed before the second piece starts. The rationale behind this is not confusing the tagger by randomly dropping words, just because they're inside some <b> tag.

typeDescription.name: werti.uima.types.Edge
typeDescription.description: Marks a unidirectional edge in a graph. Only the target node is represented, and the name. Edges are supposed to be fields of nodes.

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: The edge's name.

featureDescription.name: target
featureDescription.description: The edge's target token annotation.

typeDescription.name: werti.uima.types.Node
typeDescription.description: A node annotation, representing both leaf nodes of a graph, as well as internal nodes. Note that this node type can represent n-ary circular graphs, including multiple parent nodes. Any restriction to this, if it is desired, should originate from the implementation.

featureDescription.name: token
featureDescription.description: The token this edge represents, or null. In case this node represents a token, this will be a Token, otherwise null.

featureDescription.name: parents
featureDescription.description: A list of edges representing links to the node's parents.

featureDescription.name: children
featureDescription.description: A list of edges, representing the node's children.

typeDescription.name: werti.uima.types.annot.Token
typeDescription.description: A relevant Token with PoS information attached.

featureDescription.name: tag
featureDescription.description: Part of speech.

featureDescription.name: detailedtag
featureDescription.description: Detailed part of speech.

featureDescription.name: lemma
featureDescription.description: The lemma of the word in this token. May remain empty if there is no lemmatizer around.

featureDescription.name: gerund
featureDescription.description: The -ing form of the word in this token, if it is an infinitive. May remain empty if there is no generator around or if it's not an infinitive.

featureDescription.name: chunk
featureDescription.description: The chunk tags for this token.

featureDescription.name: mltag
featureDescription.description: A tag added by an activity-specific machine learning-based tagger.

featureDescription.name: depid
featureDescription.description: Token ID used to stored dependency parse (should we use position instead?).

featureDescription.name: dephead
featureDescription.description: Head token in dependency parse (refers to ID in the same sentence).

featureDescription.name: deprel
featureDescription.description: Relation to head token in dependency parse.

featureDescription.name: maltdepid
featureDescription.description: Token ID used to stored dependency parse (should we use position instead?).

featureDescription.name: maltdephead
featureDescription.description: Head token in dependency parse (refers to ID in the same sentence).

featureDescription.name: maltdeprel
featureDescription.description: Relation to head token in dependency parse.

featureDescription.name: tag_name
featureDescription.description: The name of the tag.

featureDescription.name: closing
featureDescription.description: Is this tag closing?

featureDescription.name: irrelevant
featureDescription.description: Is this a tag irrelevant to the interpreter? (like script, functional comment tags...)

typeDescription.name: werti.uima.types.annot.SentenceAnnotation
typeDescription.description: A sentence in natural language derived from plain text and HTML features.

featureDescription.name: coherence
featureDescription.description: The coherence of this sentence. How many html tags interefere?

featureDescription.name: sexp
featureDescription.description: The Sexp of the parse of this sentence.

featureDescription.name: hasdepparse
featureDescription.description: A flag that marks whether this sentence made it past the filter and has a parse.

featureDescription.name: activeconversion
featureDescription.description: The active version of a passive sentence.

featureDescription.name: passiveconversion
featureDescription.description: The passive version of an active sentence.

featureDescription.name: graphs_debug
featureDescription.description: An array of sentence of file location for sentence parses that belong to this sentence.

featureDescription.name: parseCandidate
featureDescription.description: Indicates that a sentence should be parsed further down the pipeline.

typeDescription.name: werti.uima.types.annot.PlainTextSentenceAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Sentence detection based on plain text input.

typeDescription.name: werti.uima.types.Enhancement
typeDescription.description: Describes an enhancment on the current spot.

featureDescription.name: EnhanceStart
featureDescription.description: The start tag of the enhancement annotation.

featureDescription.name: EnhanceEnd
featureDescription.description: The end tag of the enhancement annotation.

featureDescription.name: Relevant
featureDescription.description: Whether this annotation will be relevant for the activity.

featureDescription.name: trigger
featureDescription.description: The token(s) that triggered the markup of this conditional (possibly empty).

featureDescription.name: condition
featureDescription.description: The verb (cluster) that represents the condition of this conditional.

featureDescription.name: result
featureDescription.description: The verb (cluster) representing the result of this conditional.

featureDescription.name: verb
featureDescription.description: The verb part of the phrasal verb.

featureDescription.name: particle
featureDescription.description: The particle part of the phrasal verb.

featureDescription.name: np
featureDescription.description: The associated NP part for some phrasal verbs.

typeDescription.name: werti.uima.types.annot.CGToken
typeDescription.description: A token with added Constraint Grammar analysis information.

featureDescription.name: readings
featureDescription.description: A set of readings in this cohort.

typeDescription.name: werti.uima.types.annot.CGReading
typeDescription.description: A reading in a constraint grammar cohort.
